message:
<Pass It On>
How would you like to be the only owner of a limited edition phone? 

Submit a video of you showcasing your fanciful soccer moves and be sure to feature your TelCo's logo in a creative way (Eg, filming the video in front of the TelCo store) and stand to win a Numbered Barcelona Edition R7Plus!

Users from all our TelCo partners Singtel, M1 and StarHub will stand to win a phone each from their respective Telcos, so nobody is left out!

PS: You too, will double your chance to win the trip to Barcelona with Joanna Lim from Night Owl Cinematics by including the TelCos in your video, so wait no more, #PassItOn!

Submit your entries here: http://bit.ly/OPPOpass

<Pass It On>
FC Barcelona’s games are always about style and flair, but also a lot of passing. Why not see them in play yourself? 

Travel to Barcelona with Joanna Lim from Night Owl Cinematics! All you have to do is show off your best tricks and skills for a chance to win the ultimate fan experience! 

Grab a ball, and wow us with your own tricks! Don’t forget to finish your move off by passing it on! Enter here:http://events.oppo.com/pass-it-on/

Event starts from 6pm!

Are you a Soccer Fan? Are you a fan of Joanna from Night Owl Cinematics? Are you both? 

Get ready for our grandest prize ever! Stay tuned, for this is something you DO NOT want to miss. 

#PassItOn #BarcelonaTrip #ComingSoon

Singtel                 - 8203
M1                       - 8251 / 7161
OPPO Retailers   - 6425 / 6201

Starhub booth is between Towers 1 & 2

<Ollie Giveaway!>

You've heard of the Facebook Reactions, and now it's time to apply them and stand a chance to win yourself an Ollie Doll! 

All you have to do is allocate the right reactions to the right situations and we'll select the winners! 

Best of luck Ofans! 

Contest ends on 6th March, 2016.

Make a guess. How long does it take to charge a phone from 0 to 100% with Super VOOC?

30 minutes? 20 minutes? :) You're so wrong.
Android Authoriy is excited for our new tech: "A new era for image stabilization in smartphones: cheaper, faster and better. What more could we want!" http://bit.ly/AA-OIS

One of the marvels of the #OPPOF1. 
#OPPOSelf1e

<Updated Announcement>
We will be having a renovation at our Suntec City Concept Store, and will be having a temporary location to satisfy the Ofans' needs ;)

The Service Center and Concept Store at Suntec will be closed tomorrow, 1st of March, and operations will resume as usual at our new location on the 2nd of March :)

Update: Both numbers for our Service Center and Suntec Concept Store will not be operational on 1st of March too.

Our ChinaTown Concept Store will be officially up tomorrow and we will be having a promotion tomorrow to celebrate our opening! 

From Feb 5th to Feb 18th, you can:

1) Get 20% off all accessories!

2) Pop a balloon and stand a chance to win Hong Baos (Red Packets) hidden within! 

3) Get Double the points for membership!

Promotion only available at our ChinaTown Concept Store! :)

Service Center Opening Hours : Wednesday to Monday, 11am to 7pm
